member.name: T:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPerson
member.summary: Your Fate/Grand Order servant

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPerson.GeneratedWith
member.summary: The string that was used when generating this servants class

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPerson.BasicInformation
member.summary: The basic information about this servant (.e.g. Name, HP, ATK etc...)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPerson.ActiveSkills
member.summary: All the Active Skills this servant has

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPerson.PassiveSkills
member.summary: All the Passive Skills this servant has

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPerson.FromCache
member.summary: If the servant is in cache

member.name: T:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic
member.summary: Basic information about your Fate/Grand Order servant

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.EnglishName
member.summary: Gives you the English name of the servant (gets assigned when class is made)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.JapaneseName
member.summary: Gives you the Japanese name of the servant (jname)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.VoiceActor
member.summary: Gives you the name of the servants voice actor (voicea)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Illustrator
member.summary: Gives you the name of the illustrator (illus)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Class
member.summary: Gives you the servants class (class)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.ATK
member.summary: Gives both the basic and max level ATK of the servant (atk)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.HP
member.summary: Gives both the basic and max level HP of the servant (hp)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.GrailATK
member.summary: Gives you the max ATK after max ascension and after it's reached max level with grails (gatk)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.GrailHP
member.summary: Gives you the max HP amount after max ascension and after it's reached max level with grails (ghp)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Stars
member.summary: (stars)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Cost
member.summary: Shows you the cost of the servant (cost)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.QQQAB
member.summary: (cc)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.MaxLevel
member.summary: Gives you the servant max level with ascension (mlevel)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.ID
member.summary: Returns the servants ID (id)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Attribute
member.summary: Shows you their attribute (Man, Earth, Sky, Beast) (attribute)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.QuickHits
member.summary: (qhits)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.ArtsHits
member.summary: (ahits)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.BusterHits
member.summary: (bhits)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.ExtraHits
member.summary: (ehits)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.DeathRate
member.summary: Chances of this servant being killed by the Instant-Kill effect (deathrate)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.StarAbsorption
member.summary: How many critical stars this servant gets when the stars are distributed (starabsorption)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.StarGeneration
member.summary: Shows how many critical stars this servant generates when attacking (stargeneration)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.NPChargeATK
member.summary: Shows how much the NP Gauge is increased by when attacking enemies (npchargeatk)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.NPChargeDEF
member.summary: Shows how much the NP Gauge is increased by when being attacked (npchargedef)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.GrowthCurve
member.summary: Shows the servants growth curve which relates to the stats gained per level (growthc)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.AKA
member.summary: Also known as. This will show what other names the servant is also known by (aka)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Traits
member.summary: Shows you the trait(s) of the servant (traits)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Gender
member.summary: Returns the servants gender (gender)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Alignment
member.summary: Returns the servants alignment (Lawful - Neutral - Chaotic | Good - Neutral - Evil) (alignment)

member.name: P:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.FateGrandOrderPersonBasic.Images
member.summary: (image)

member.name: T:FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.PresetsForInformation
member.summary: Presets for what information to get

member.name: T:FateGrandOrderApi.FateGrandOrderParsing
member.summary: Class containing parsing logic (this is where you get your people and skills from)

member.name: M:FateGrandOrderApi.FateGrandOrderParsing.GetSkill(System.String)
member.summary: This will return a Skill (will return null if the skill isn't found)
member.param: The Skill name to look for
String[] we use to make the Skill (this is exposed for other Skill types as it will contain the Information needed to make them too)

member.name: M:FateGrandOrderApi.FateGrandOrderParsing.GetSkills(System.String)
member.summary: This will return a filled in ActiveSkill (If the skill isn't a ActiveSkill it will return the core skill content and this will return a ActiveSkill only with the ActiveSkill name you used if the skill isn't found)
member.param: The ActiveSkill name to look for

member.name: M:FateGrandOrderApi.FateGrandOrderParsing.GetSkill(FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.ActiveSkill)
member.summary: This will return a filled in ActiveSkill (If the skill isn't a ActiveSkill it will return the core skill content and this will return what was in the ActiveSkills already if the skill isn't found)
member.param: The ActiveSkill to put all the content into

member.name: M:FateGrandOrderApi.FateGrandOrderParsing.GetPerson(System.String,FateGrandOrderApi.Classes.PresetsForInformation,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This will return the servant from the servant name (will return null if we are unable to find the person)
